  )

```{r, context='server', echo=T}
data <- as.data.frame(data)

output$time_plot <- renderPlotly({
a <- data %>% ggplot(aes(x=meses, y=data[,input$time_plot], col=colonias, group=colonias)) + 
  geom_line() + theme(legend.position = 'bottom')

ggplotly(a)  
})


output$teste <- renderPlot({
  print(input$time_plot)
data %>% ggplot(aes(x=meses, y=data[,input$time_plot], col=colonias, group=colonias)) + 
  geom_line() + theme(legend.position = 'bottom')
 
})

```
